name: Magus

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 16%.

skills.name: Paralyze
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Toxin
skills.raw_description:
Has a 75% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Vitality Theft
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies, then heals this Champion. The amount by which this Champion is healed is equal to the damage inflicted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
